attributes.action: Sort the mice/rat infestation out in Crayburn  house aikman avenue
attributes.additional_details: I have pictures of my cooker and droppings on my floors also others have complained to not just in the one block it all of the flats that's are infested it's unhygienic and not healthy
attributes.background: Flats unsuitable for family living due to vermin infestation I've had mice nesting in my cooker and in and out of my property others have complained also about mice and rats in the flats

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament can't help you with this. You could try contacting your local council about this problem. You can find their contact details here: https://www.leicester.gov.uk/contact-us/
